content.text: 2 quarts vegetable oil for deep frying
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "2 quarts vegetable oil for deep frying" )

content.text: 0) In a large skillet or deep fryer, fry chicken wings in oil until done, about 10 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "fry"@37:40 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "chicken wings"@41:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "oil"@58:61 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until done"@62:72 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-0-0 "about 10 minutes"@74:90 / DUR )
		:loc ( "or"@-1:-1 / CHOICE
			:option ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@6:21 / TOOL )
			:option ( tool-0-1 "deep fryer"@25:35 / TOOL )
		)
	)
)

content.text: 1) Remove chicken and oil from skillet, drain oil and reserve chicken.
2) Melt butter in skillet, then add vinegar and hot sauce.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "butter"@8:14 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "skillet"@18:25 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "add"@32:35 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "vinegar"@36:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "hot sauce"@48:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4) Add cooked chicken to sauce and stir over low heat to coat.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "cooked chicken"@7:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "sauce"@25:30 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "stir"@35:39 / AC
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "low heat"@45:53 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-4-0 "to coat"@54:61 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) The longer the wings simmer in the sauce, the hotter they will be.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "simmer"@24:30 / AC
		:ppt ( "the wings"@14:23 / FOOD )
		:heat ( "The longer"@3:13 / OTHER )
		:loc ( "the sauce"@34:43 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-5-0 "the hotter they will be"@45:68 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
